duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and execute the brand’s visual identity for marketing campaigns and initiatives across digital, apparel, print, and video.
Design engaging and brand-consistent assets for use in digital experiences that will drive social buzz.
Be at the heart of youth culture trends, understand what speaks to Gen-Z, and translate it to creative.
Ensure assets look and feel consistent across all touchpoints (OTT, OOH, social, digital, e-com, wearables, retail, events, etc).
Collaborate with brand/marketing to ensure culturally relevant, disruptive & defining brand moments.
Set the bar for elevated design on the team with strong skills across digital asset creation.
Conceptualize, mock-up, and execute designs with ease, understanding contemporary apparel trends.
Manage the 'day to day' asset creation, ensuring deadlines are met, and quality and expectations are achieved.
Brainstorm and bring ideas that support big picture endeavors as well as timely organic trends.
Contribute to a creative work environment and support the Creative Director on multiple projects.
Assist in photoshoot concepting, scheduling, and image retouching.
Communicate and give professional feedback to freelancers and outside collaborators.
Consistently research, identify, and share current industry design trends and competitive reviews as they relate to the brand.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
